mapper.select: SELECT ts.* FROM t_subject ts WHERE ts.state = 4 AND ts.type = 1 # GROUP BY ts.pk_id, ts.title, ts.cover, ts.label, ts.browse_num, ts.star_num, ts.type
SELECT ts.* FROM t_subject ts WHERE ts.state = 4 AND ts.type = 0 # GROUP BY ts.pk_id, ts.title, ts.cover, ts.label, ts.browse_num, ts.star_num, ts.type
SELECT ts.* FROM t_subject ts WHERE ts.state = 4 AND ts.pk_id = #{id} GROUP BY ts.pk_id, ts.cover, ts.brief, ts.claim
SELECT ts.pk_id, ts.title, ts.cover, ts.label, ts.browse_num, ts.star_num, ts.type FROM t_subject ts WHERE title LIKE '%${title}%'
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 AS exists_flag FROM t_index_content tic JOIN t_subject ON tic.content_id = t_subject.pk_id WHERE tic.content_id = #{pkId} AND t_subject.type = 0 AND tic.type = 0
